enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: Parties suggested proposals to increase efficiency through innovations such as agenda clustering and multi-year work cycles (FCCC/SBI/2006/3 and MISC.8).
The G-77/CHINA requested a more detailed discussion on clustering, and the EU said it could agree to several of the proposals.
Informal consultations will take place on Monday afternoon.
